column1: Master of Science in International Marine Biological Resources
column5: Two year taught International MSc programme covers a wide range of subjects related to the sustainable use of marine biological resourcesThis is a unique opportunity to study at a choice of nine European universities and receive one joint degree, while gaining access to Europe's top marine research institutes.As a student on this exciting Masters programme, you will have the opportunity to:
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
